invariants.slip_desc: staring at the empty glass with clinical detachment
holding the torch but not looking at it

crew.name: Blair

invariants.slip_desc: explaining everything is fine with a fixed smile
looking through the microscope but it's not even on
Blair is away from his microscope. He's never this idle.

crew.schedule_slip_reason: Blair should be in Rec Room around 2300, but is in Radio Room.
crew.out_of_place_reason: Expected: Rec Room, current: Radio Room

crew.name: Garry

invariants.slip_desc: staring blankly at the wall with the handgun in pieces

crew.schedule_slip_reason: Garry should be in Rec Room around 2300, but is in Mess Hall.
crew.out_of_place_reason: Expected: Rec Room, current: Mess Hall

invariants.baseline: humming a tune while checking the pantry
invariants.slip_desc: standing perfectly still in the dark
listening to the static with rapt attention
staring at the blood bank with a strange hunger
Copper should be in the Infirmary. He looks nervous being away.

crew.name: Norris
crew.schedule_slip_reason: Norris should be in Rec Room around 2300, but is in Sleeping Quarters.
crew.out_of_place_reason: Expected: Rec Room, current: Sleeping Quarters

invariants.slip_desc: telling everyone it's actually quite warm

crew.name: Clark

invariants.slip_desc: staring at the dogs with a predatory gaze
Clark is wandering far from the kennel. The dogs are alone.

crew.schedule_slip_reason: Clark should be in Rec Room around 2300, but is in Corridor (Sector 10,11).

crew.name: Palmer
crew.schedule_slip_reason: Palmer should be in Rec Room around 2300, but is in Corridor (Sector 6,13).
